comments: She\'s a good teacher. I felt like there was a lot of work in the class and for a while it didn\'t really connect to much for me, but then it came together and I felt like I learned alot. I would take more classes with this teacher.

I really liked her. She cares more about her students than any other prof at ECSU. She really listens to what the students are interested in and then kind of directs the class toward what the students want to learn. This is really good in an upper level course because it lets you learn about what you care about.

If you\'re just at college to party then you won\'t like her. She\'s a great professor for serious students who really want to learn about the world & how politics effects all sorts of different things. When I was a freshmen I didn\'t like her, recently I figured out how much she teaches. It\'s not just multiple choice, you have to think in her classes.

THE BEST! In upper level classes de Vries really listens to what students are interested in and then takes the class in that direction. This is great because as a PSC major it\'s good to be able to investigate areas of interest and not just have to keep taking survey courses. She brings in speakers and cares about students\' experiences. THE BEST.

deVries will make you think about things that you never considered before and will make you look at things in a whole new way. She is such a great teacher you don\'t even get how much you have learned until you hear yourself talking! Also, deVries will really help you find opportunities. There\'s a lot of reading, but it\'s college!
I love Dr. De Vries classes. The last one was tough. LOTS OF READING. LOTS OF CLASS DISCUSSIONS. Its not easy, but the classes are very interesting if your a political science major
I really enjoyed her classes. If your a poli sci major she\'s one of the best teachers. If you want an easy useless class just to get a good grade pick someone else to teach you

This class is hard, TONS OF READING, one huge 15pg essay, requires you to read New York Times or any other political paper before class. Knows way to much about the subject, and will make you look like a jack ass if you give an incorrect answer. She debates everything, it\'s a really good class and you will learn a lot about the world,etc
I love Dr. de Vries. She makes sure you know what you know what you\'re doing, and makes sure you can do it well.
